item.title: Analysts call for big declines in Palantir despite solid earnings; Goldman sees more than 25% drop
item.description: The firm reported in-line earnings and topped revenue estimates in the first quarter.

item.title: Buy this e-commerce stock that can navigate tariffs and has more than 20% upside, says BMO
item.description: BMO initiated the stock with an outperform rating and a $120 per share price target.

item.title: Here are Tuesday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Apple, Palantir, Shopify, Tesla, AT&T, ServiceNow, McDonald's and more
item.description: Here are Tuesday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: This group of stocks offers a ‘trade war shield,’ says BCA Research
item.description: Cybersecurity stocks, being a primarily service-based industry, could offer investors a hedge against tariff volatility.

item.title: Don't count former JPMorgan strategist Kolanovic as part of the Palantir 'growth cult'
item.description: Shares were roughly 12% lower on Tuesday following first-quarter results.
